task.title: Accessing Expanded channel views
task.shortdesc: Use the Expanded channel view of a report to examine customer behavior within each of the channels in the paths.

step.cmd: Open the report that you want to view.

substep.cmd: In the title bar, click Report Status.
Under Completed reports, select the report that you want to view.

info.note: If the report returned results, it is listed in the menu as "Completed" with the date and time that the report finished running. If the report is listed as "No data found", you can try modifying the report criteria to obtain results.
info.p: The Channel Summary of the report opens with the Separated view displayed by default.

step.cmd: To access the Expanded view of a path, click one of the channel icons in the path, or click Options and select Expanded view from the Actions menu.

stepresult.p: The Expanded view opens and displays the Aggregates view of the selected channel. If you opened the Expanded view from the Actions menu, the first channel in the path is selected.

step.cmd: Click Micro-paths to view the micro-paths for the selected channel.
